tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Oral Surgery Procedures,Maxillo Facial Treatment,Oral Lesions Screening,
review:
Following testimonial for Dr. V. Srinivas Reddy includes details of how we interacted with him for my mother‚Äôs treatment which I felt was necessary for me to convey the admiration for Dr. Reddy which I developed during the treatment and I hope this helps families like us to find the right care and treatment for their loved ones in time...

We came across Dr. V. Srinivas Reddy when looking for a Maxillofacial surgeon for a second opinion for my mother. We had consulted a local dentist at first who diagnosed ulcerations and prescribed a local application of an ointment. However, as the issue did not subside even after 3-4 weeks of continuous use of the medication, we decided to go for a second opinion. This is when we came across Dr. V. Srinivas Reddy. 
Dr. Reddy was very courteous and patient with us in trying to get to know the history of the ailment, the symptoms my mother was experiencing and what we had been doing to address it. Dr. Reddy upon his examination of the issue suspected it to be a squamous cell carcinoma and advised we get a few tests done to be certain of the diagnosis. It turned out to be the same and Dr. Reddy did not squander time anymore and was very transparent in his conversations with us and made sure we understood the illness and the treatment process. Reassurance from the doctor that this is nothing to be worried about and that we came to him at the right time was really comforting, a relief to know it would all be fine after the treatment is complete. The treatment was a 2-stage process where the tumour would be removed by a surgical procedure first followed by a full round of radiotherapy. 

We completed all hospital formalities to prepare for the surgery. Dr. Reddy was the surgeon and after the surgery was complete, he was very articulate in making us understand how the tumour and adjacent margins were successfully removed. Dr. Reddy also visited my mother in the hospital as part of the daily rounds to see how she was recovering and if there was a need to address any minor expected post-surgical issues. He was very supportive and positive in his consultations with my mother and this I feel played a major role as  this not only gave reassurance to my mother that all will be well, but also it gave us, the family, the mental strength we needed to remain positive in the situation and support my mother in her recovery. 
Dr. Reddy forewarned us that radiotherapy (RT) is the more complex part of the treatment which would require my mother to be patient and brave at the same time. He was also very proactive in sharing some medical articles on the illness and the treatment so that we wouldn‚Äôt rely on unverified online sources for the information and take unnecessary stress. The advice from Dr. Reddy helped my mother prepare mentally for the RT and it helped us, the family to prepare a plan as to how we would care for our mother during the treatment addressing any expected side-effects (darkening of the skin at the site, ulcerations in the mouth, loss of appetite, general weakness, etc.). Even during RT, Dr. Reddy advised us to visit him once a week for him to observe how my mother was responding to the treatment and if any medication would be required for the expected side-effects. There were times when my mother was experiencing pain due to ulcerations following RT and swallowing food became difficult. We informed Dr. Reddy about the symptoms immediately and he was kind enough to call us in his clinic the next day to examine the symptoms which shows he responds to urgency promptly, really does care for his patients and wouldn‚Äôt try to avoid any follow-up visits his patients might seek. The due diligence and care for his patients displayed by Dr. Reddy was truly motivational and very refreshing to see for me personally. All in all, Dr. Reddy has ensured all his patients experience very high standards of care and treatment at his clinic and I, have no doubts absolutely in recommending Dr. Reddy to everyone who are reading this testimonial to make sure their loved ones get the skilled treatment and care under Dr. Reddy‚Äôs supervision. 

To the patients and their families: Though it is easy to overlook but it is very important that in cases like my mothers‚Äô it is very important for the patient and the family to be positive, motivated and show the courage required to conquer the illness. The treatment might be tough to endure but if you are able to remain positive, self-motivated, and courageous right through, you and your loved ones WILL emerge victorious from this. Just keep alive that zeal to live! and the courage to overcome all odds to spend many more years with your loved ones!

To Dr. Reddy: I have no words to say how grateful our family is to him for the care, patience and proactiveness he had shown during my mother‚Äôs treatment. Thank you, Dr. Srinivas Reddy, hope this testimonial helps others find the right care and treatment for their loved ones.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have come across Dr. V. Srinivas Reddy  when looking for a oral surgeon for a second opening, I went to my regular dental clinic as I was having swollen gum and puss leaking from the back of my jaw teeth and upon examination and scans 1st doctor said it would need a surgery, didn't explain me what was the issue just said my wisdom tooth is very far  up in the jaw bone and its a major surgery  and  they had arranged a consultation with another oral surgeon who explained that its a cyst in my jaw bone which is causing the problem and I would need a surgery and It would cost some where about 2.2 lacs without insurance and if I my insurance is approved it would cost 1.2lacs. which has given me stress and sleepless nights they  looked online and found Dr. V. Srinivas Reddy and visited his clinic . He looked at my previous reports and explained me there is cyst and  its not major  problem but the surgery would come under major surgery as the location of wisdom tooth is very far and cant keep my open for so long and would be painful which cannot be operated under local anesthesia. I would need to go under General Anesthesia. Also explained there is a  nerve very close to the cyst which can impact my sensation on the lower left side lip and teeth. He explain there will be numbness which I would regain in time. He suggested to get another ct scan report  as the previous scan was not focused on the problem area then just my face. Once I got the scan report he explained to me what is impacted and what would be possible post surgery recovery  stages and things I would experience post surgery. After talking to him I felt little relaxed.  On 14th Sep my surgery was done in Omni hospital and it went much smoother and faster than I imagined in my head. I had asked him to remove my other wisdom tooth as well while under anesthesia the day before. which he did.  My other wisdom tooth also was little further up close to my sinus socket.  He checked up on me after surgery and the next day in the morning I was discharged from hospital after his examination. I had asked him to remover my other wisdom tooth as well while under anesthesia. which The only things I had to pay was major surgical profile tests to the diagnostic center. My insurance covered the rest.... Dr. V. Srinivas Reddy have been in touch and responded to all my questions, he has checked me twice since the surgery, I  would defiantly recommend him to any one  with their oral or dental surgeries he explains everything in detail and also lets you to know to be expected.
reply_text:
Thank you Mahendar. 
We‚Äôre glad that we were able to offer you the service you expected and deserved.

He took sufficient steps for proper treatment before, during and after surgery. Considering my high level of anxiety about surgery, it is a great relief to have him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My wife was suffering with OKC symptoms two years back and we visited multiple dental hospitals near chandanahar and jubilee hills areas. Those are well established and well known dental hospitals. They could not diagnose the problem completely and did surgery to remove cyst. Since they did not completely checked, there was another cyst found inside once the first surgery completed. Again another surgery was done within a month duration. But, within 6 months when pain reoccured, we visited them again, they told cyst growth happened again in same location and this time it is more deep and spread. They asked us to get ready for another surgery. While we were not having clue on how to go about it, by gods grace, some one from our community suggested us to meet Dr Srinivas garu @ SmileTime dental, Kukatpally. While we already visited multiple bigger dental hospitals already, so, we were not sure on that advice, but, we thought, we will get opinion from Dr Srinivas and took an appointment and visited. Dr Srinivas, has gone through our past and present reports and checked thoroughly and explained in detail about the procedure to be followed. In fact, the cyst was present at 4 locations inside and not just at 1 or 2 locations. We understood that Dr Srinivas got tremendous experience with these kind of surgeries and almost weekly three or four days he will be dealing with these OKC and other related surgeries. We were very happy and very much convinced after talking to doctor. Surgery happened successfully on Oct 2021. The surgery cost as well was very much optimized with the help of Dr.Srinivas. We were very happy with evey interaction that we had with the doctor, prior to surgery and post follow-up s that we had post the surgery. Now it is 8 months competed after the surgery, my wife is not having any symptoms and not having any problems. Any one having OKC and related issues, please visit Dr Srinivas at SmileTime dental, Kukatpally, we are sure, you will get the best treatment and you will be happy that you are at right place and getting the best and correct guidance and treatment. Thank you so much to Dr Srinivas garu. 
üôèüôèüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had gone to Dr V Srinivas Reddy for my Root Canal treatment and placement of a crown. The entire experience was top class. The clinic is with best of equipment and the entire team is highly professional.  Covid protocols were followed in all seriousness. Appointment time was strictly followed. Dr Srinivas explained the procedure in great detail. The procedures were done with such perfection that within a day after the RCT and placement of crown , I feel very normal. Absolutely no pain, no need for any pain killers. And as I use my teeth, it feels as if no procedures were ever done. Dr Srinivas has magical skills when he the instruments in his hand. 
The costs are very reasonable. 
I would strongly recommend patients to Dr Srinivas for any Dental problems. I and my family will look no where else for any future requirements .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a protruding lower jaw and I have been to multiple dental clinics before I went to smiletime dental clinic. The other dentists haven't been very patient and haven't been clear with the explanation of the process but, Dr. V. Srinivas Reddy has been very patient and he explained the process since day one, he has been patient and answered all my doubts regarding the surgery. I would recommend this clinic because they never tried to mislead me and have been clear about the entire process, the price, the time and the difficulties I would face when I undergo this surgery. If you don't trust me all you have to do is take one appointment and talk to the doctor and you can decide by yourself.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: He always receives with warmth smile which makes us more comfortable and friendly towards the meeting. When it comes to diagnosis of the issue, he is one of the best in understanding and decoding the complaint. The way doctor schedules his appointments is really appreciated with almost zero waiting time. When it comes to treatment he is the best in solving the issue. Above all I strongly feel it‚Äôs rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as person with outstanding medical care. I am so glad I chose Dr. Srinivas Reddy Garu and would highly recommend to anyone.

I went to Dr Srinivas Reddy  for replacing my old bridge. He was very patient and explained me the whole procedure and there was an unexpected small surgery. I was really tensed but he explained me everything which gave me more confidence.
 He was very responsible and took care of my time factor into consideration as I don't have much time and  have to return back to US.
I am completely satisfied with his treatment and now I have very confident smile and my teeth looks natural.
I highly recommend Dr. Srinivas Reddy.
